title: No game starts, but I'm still connecting and failing connecting
body:
No game starts, but the client shows "try to reconnect". Thus, I'm still connecting to a game and of course, failing to connect. Therefore, i can't start a game now!
Please help me to tackle this issue.

replies.body:
Hey there,

What you experienced is known as a "Ghost Game" this can occur when your client doesn't fully receive the "End Game" message from the server.

These will usually resolve themselves within a few hours at most, are you still experiencing this issue?
